<A NAME="eolPage150"></A>
<A NAME="SPNE-20151231EX102CREDITAG_HTM_SF98EB4593DE14080BB8766791467BC66">
</A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	5.13
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Lender Meetings
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Parent and Borrowers will, within 90 days after the close of each fiscal year of Parent, at the request of Agent or of the Required Lenders and upon reasonable prior notice, hold a meeting (at a mutually agreeable location and time or, at the option of Agent, by conference call) with all Lenders who choose to attend such meeting at which meeting shall be reviewed the financial results of the previous fiscal year and the financial condition of Parent and its Subsidiaries and the projections presented for the current fiscal year of Parent.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	5.14
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Location of Inventory
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Each Borrower will, and will cause each of its Subsidiaries to, keep its Inventory (other than Inventory on consignment or in transit and Inventory held outside of the United States) only at the locations identified on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule&#160;4.24
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;and their principal executive offices only at the locations identified on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Item C.18 of Exhibit P-1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	provided
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, that Borrowers may amend
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule&#160;4.24
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Item C.18
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;so long as such amendment occurs by written notice to Agent not less than 10 days prior to the date on which such Inventory is moved to such new location or such principal executive office is relocated and so long as such new location is within the continental United States.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	5.15
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Compliance with Health Care Laws.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	In addition to complying with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section&#160;5.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, each Borrower and each of its Subsidiaries will comply in all material respects with all applicable Health Care Laws.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Each Borrower and each of its Subsidiaries shall (i)&#160;obtain, maintain and preserve, and cause each of its Subsidiaries to obtain, maintain and preserve, and take all necessary action to timely renew, all material Health Care Permits (including, as applicable, Health Care Permits necessary for it to be eligible to receive payment and compensation from and to participate in any Third Party Payor Arrangements) which are necessary or useful in the proper conduct of its business; (ii)&#160;be and remain in material compliance with all requirements for participation in, and for licensure required to provide the goods or services that are reimbursable under, all Third Party Payor Arrangements; and (iii)&#160;keep and maintain all records required to be maintained by any Governmental Authority or otherwise under any Health Care Law.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	By a date not later than March&#160;31,&#160;2016, Parent and SeaSpine Orthopedics shall adopt and cause their respective Subsidiaries to maintain a corporate and health care regulatory compliance program (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	RCP
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;) which addresses the requirements of Health Care Laws, including without limitation HIPAA, and includes at least the following components: (i)&#160;standards of conduct and procedures that describe compliance policies regarding laws with an emphasis on prevention of fraud and abuse; (ii)&#160;a specific officer within high-level personnel identified as having overall responsibility for compliance with such standards and procedures; (iii)&#160;training and education programs which effectively communicate the compliance standards and procedures to employees and agents, including fraud and abuse laws and illegal billing practices; (iv)&#160;auditing and monitoring systems and reasonable steps for achieving compliance with such standards and procedures
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:312PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	54
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:7PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:7PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage151"></A>
<A NAME="SPNE-20151231EX102CREDITAG_HTM_SF98EB4593DE14080BB8766791467BC66">
</A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	including publicizing a reporting system to allow employees and other agents to anonymously report criminal or suspect conduct and potential compliance problems; (v)&#160;disciplinary guidelines and consistent enforcement of compliance policies including discipline of individuals responsible for the failure to detect violations of the RCP; and (vi)&#160;mechanisms to immediately respond to detected violations of the RCP. Each Borrower and each of its Subsidiaries shall modify such RCPs from time to time, as may be necessary to ensure continuing compliance with all applicable Health Care Laws. Upon request, the Agent (and/or its consultants) shall be permitted to review such RCPs.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Borrower shall provide to Agent upon request, an accurate, complete and current list of all Third Party Payor Arrangements with respect to the business of the Borrowers and their Subsidiaries.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	5.16
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Protection of Intellectual Property
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Each Loan Party shall (a)&#160;protect, defend and maintain the validity and enforceability of any Intellectual Property material to the business of the Loan Parties and (b)&#160;not allow any Intellectual Property material to the Loan Parties&#8217; business to be abandoned, forfeited or dedicated to the public without Agent&#8217;s prior written consent. Each Loan Party shall at all times use commercially reasonable efforts to conduct its business without, in any material respect, infringing, misappropriating, diluting, violating, or otherwise impairing the Intellectual Property of any other Person. Each Loan Party shall remain liable under each of its Intellectual Property licenses pursuant to which it is a licensee that are material to such Loan Party&#8217;s business, and shall observe and perform, in all material respects, all of the conditions and obligations to be observed and performed by it thereunder. None of Agent or any Lender shall have any obligation or liability under any such license by reason of or arising out of any Loan Document, the granting of a Lien, if any, in such license or the receipt by Agent (on behalf of itself and Lenders) of any payment relating to any such license. If after the Closing Date any Loan Party (i)&#160;obtains any patent, registered trademark or servicemark, registered copyright, registered mask work, or any pending application for any of the foregoing, whether as owner, licensee or otherwise, or (ii)&#160;applies for any patent or the registration of any trademark, servicemark, copyright or mask work, in each case that is material to any such Loan Party, then such Loan Party shall concurrently with the delivery of the next Compliance Certificate in accordance with this Agreement provide written notice thereof to Agent and shall promptly execute an Intellectual Property Security Agreement (or updates to the Exhibits to the Intellectual Property Security Agreement previously delivered if not filed at such time by Agent) and other documents and take such other actions as Agent shall request to protect or perfect and maintain a first priority perfected security interest (which will be effective as provided herein) in favor of Agent, for the benefit of Lenders, in such Property. If requested by Agent, each Loan Party shall promptly provide to Agent copies of all applications that it files for patents or for the registration of trademarks, servicemarks, copyrights or mask works.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	5.17
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Collateral
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Access Agreements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Unless otherwise agreed to by Agent in writing, each Loan Party shall obtain and maintain a Collateral Access Agreement with respect to any real
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:312PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	55
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:7PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:7PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage152"></A>
<A NAME="SPNE-20151231EX102CREDITAG_HTM_SF98EB4593DE14080BB8766791467BC66">
</A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	property (other than real property owned by such Loan Party) (a)&#160;that is such Loan Party&#8217;s principal place of business, (b)&#160;where such Loan Party&#8217;s books or records are maintained and (c)&#160;where any Collateral (other than Inventory on consignment) is stored or maintained.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	6.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NEGATIVE COVENANTS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Each of Parent and each Borrower (jointly and severally) covenants and agrees that, until termination of all of the Commitments and payment in full of the Obligations (other than contingent Obligations as to which any claim has been asserted):
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	6.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Indebtedness
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Neither Parent nor any Borrower shall permit any of its Subsidiaries to create, incur, assume, suffer to exist, guarantee, or otherwise become or remain, directly or indirectly, liable with respect to any Indebtedness, except for Permitted Indebtedness.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	6.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Liens
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Neither Parent nor any Borrower shall, nor shall they permit their respective Subsidiaries to, create, incur, assume, or suffer to exist, directly or indirectly, any Lien on or with respect to any of its assets, of any kind, whether now owned or hereafter acquired, or any income or profits therefrom, except for Permitted Liens.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	6.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Restrictions on Fundamental Changes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Neither Parent, any Borrower nor any of their respective Subsidiaries will,
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Other than in order to consummate a Permitted Acquisition or an IsoTis Acquisition, enter into any merger, consolidation, reorganization, or recapitalization, or reclassify its Equity Interests, except for any (i)&#160;merger or such other transaction between Borrowers,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	provided
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, that no merger may occur between Parent and any Borrower and (ii)&#160;merger or such other transaction between a Borrower and a Subsidiary of such Borrower that is not a Loan Party so long as such Borrower is the surviving entity of any such merger and (iii)&#160;merger or such other transaction between Subsidiaries which are not Borrowers or Guarantors,
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	liquidate, wind up, or dissolve itself (or suffer any liquidation or dissolution), except for (i)&#160;the liquidation or dissolution of non-operating Subsidiaries with nominal assets and nominal liabilities, (ii)&#160;the liquidation or dissolution of a Loan Party (other than Parent or any Borrower) or any of its wholly-owned Subsidiaries so long as all of the assets (including any interest in any Equity Interests) of such liquidating or dissolving Loan Party or Subsidiary are transferred to a Loan Party that is not liquidating or dissolving, or (iii)&#160;the liquidation or dissolution of a Subsidiary that is not a Loan Party so long as all of the assets of such liquidating or dissolving Subsidiary are transferred to a Subsidiary that is not liquidating or dissolving or to a Subsidiary which would not be required to be a Loan Party pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section&#160;5.11
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:312PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	56
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:7PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:7PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>

<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage153"></A>
<A NAME="SPNE-20151231EX102CREDITAG_HTM_SF98EB4593DE14080BB8766791467BC66">
</A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	suspend or cease operating a substantial portion of its or their business, except as permitted pursuant to clauses&#160;(a) or (b)&#160;above or in connection with a transaction permitted under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section&#160;6.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	6.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Disposal of Assets
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Other than Permitted Dispositions or transactions expressly permitted by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sections&#160;6.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	6.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;neither Parent nor any Borrower shall, nor shall they permit their respective Subsidiaries to Transfer or otherwise dispose of (or enter into an agreement to Transfer or otherwise dispose of) any of its or their assets.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	6.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Nature of Business
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Neither Parent nor any Borrower shall, nor shall they permit their respective Subsidiaries to, make any change in the nature of its or their business as described in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule&#160;6.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;or acquire any properties or assets that are not reasonably related to the conduct of such business activities;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	provided
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, that the foregoing shall not prevent Parent, any Borrower or any of their respective Subsidiaries from engaging in any business that is reasonably related or ancillary to its or their business.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	6.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Prepayments and Amendments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Neither Parent nor any Borrower shall, nor shall they permit their respective Subsidiaries to,
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(f)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Except in connection with Refinancing Indebtedness permitted by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section&#160;6.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	,
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(iii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	optionally prepay, redeem, defease, purchase, or otherwise acquire any Indebtedness of Parent, any Borrower or any of their Subsidiaries, other than (A)&#160;the Obligations in accordance with this Agreement, and (B)&#160;Permitted Intercompany Advances, or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(iv)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	make any payment on account of Indebtedness that has been contractually subordinated in right of payment to the Obligations if such payment is not permitted at such time under the subordination terms and conditions, or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(g)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Directly or indirectly, amend, modify, or change any of the terms or provisions of
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	any agreement, instrument, document, indenture, or other writing evidencing or concerning Permitted Indebtedness other than (A)&#160;the Obligations in accordance with this Agreement, (B)&#160;Permitted Intercompany Advances, (C)&#160;Indebtedness permitted under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	clauses&#160;(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	(h)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	(j)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	(k)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;of the definition of Permitted Indebtedness and (D)&#160;any other amendments, modifications or changes so long as after giving effect thereto the applicable agreement, instrument, document, indenture or other writing constitutes Permitted Indebtedness,
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:312PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	57
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:7PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:7PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage154"></A>
<A NAME="SPNE-20151231EX102CREDITAG_HTM_SF98EB4593DE14080BB8766791467BC66">
</A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	the Governing Documents of any Loan Party or any of its Subsidiaries if the effect thereof, either individually or in the aggregate, could reasonably be expected to be materially adverse to the interests of the Lenders,
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(iii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	the Patent Licenses with respect to any Eligible Inventory, except to the extent that such amendment, modification, or change could not, individually or in the aggregate, reasonably be expected to be materially adverse to the interests of Agent or any Lender (it being understood that any amendment or modification that restricts the ability of the Parent or any of its Subsidiaries to sublicense or assign any Intellectual Property in respect of any such Patent License to Agent shall be deemed to be materially adverse to the interests of Agent and the Lenders), or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(iv)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	any other Material Contract, except to the extent that such amendment, modification, or change could not, individually or in the aggregate, reasonably be expected to be materially adverse to the interests of Agent or any Lender.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	6.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Restricted Payments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Neither Parent nor any Borrower shall, nor shall they permit their respective Subsidiaries to, make any Restricted Payment, except as permitted under Section&#160;2.15(i).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	6.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Accounting Methods
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Neither Parent nor any Borrower shall, nor shall they permit their respective Subsidiaries to, modify or change its fiscal year or its method of accounting (other than as may be required to conform to or is permitted by GAAP).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	6.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Investments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Neither Parent nor any Borrower shall, nor shall they permit their respective Subsidiaries to, directly or indirectly, make or acquire any Investment or incur any liabilities (including contingent obligations) for or in connection with any Investment except for Permitted Investments.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	6.10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Transactions with Affiliates
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Neither Parent nor any Borrower shall, nor shall they permit their respective Subsidiaries to, directly or indirectly, enter into or permit to exist any transaction with any Affiliate of any Loan Party except for:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	transactions (other than the payment of management, consulting, monitoring, or advisory fees) between Parent or any Borrower or any of their Subsidiaries, on the one hand, and any Affiliate of Parent or any Borrower or any of their Subsidiaries, on the other hand, so long as such transactions (i)&#160;are fully disclosed to Agent prior to the consummation thereof, if they involve one or more payments by Parent, such Borrower or such Subsidiary in excess of $100,000 for any single transaction or series of related transactions and (ii)&#160;are no less favorable, taken as a whole, to Parent, such Borrower or such Subsidiary, as applicable, than would be obtained in an arm&#8217;s length transaction with a non-Affiliate,
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:312PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	58
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:7PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:7PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage155"></A>
<A NAME="SPNE-20151231EX102CREDITAG_HTM_SF98EB4593DE14080BB8766791467BC66">
</A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	so long as it has been approved by Parent&#8217;s, such Borrower&#8217;s or such Subsidiary&#8217;s board of directors (or comparable governing body) if required by applicable law, any indemnity provided for the benefit of directors or officers (or comparable managers) of Parent, such Borrower or such Subsidiary,
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	so long as it has been approved by Parent&#8217;s, such Borrower&#8217;s or such Subsidiary&#8217;s board of directors (or comparable governing body) if required by applicable law, the payment of reasonable compensation (including equity awards and related documentation), severance, or employee benefit arrangements to employees, officers, and outside directors of Parent, such Borrower and such Subsidiaries in the ordinary course of business and consistent with industry practice, and
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	transactions permitted by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section&#160;6.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section&#160;6.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, or any Permitted Intercompany Advance.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	6.11
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Use of Proceeds
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Neither Parent nor any Borrower shall, nor shall they permit their respective Subsidiaries to, use the proceeds of the Loans for any purpose other than (a)&#160;on the Closing Date, to pay the fees, costs, and expenses incurred in connection with this Agreement, the other Loan Documents, and the transactions contemplated hereby and thereby, in each case, as set forth in the Funds Flow Agreement, and (b)&#160;thereafter, consistent with the terms and conditions hereof, for their lawful and permitted purposes (including that no part of the proceeds of the Loans made to Borrowers will be used to purchase or carry any such Margin Stock or to extend credit to others for the purpose of purchasing or carrying any such Margin Stock or for any purpose that violates the provisions of Regulation T, U or X of the Board of Governors).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	6.12
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Limitation on Issuance of Equity Interests
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Other than in connection with a Permitted Disposition or a Permitted Acquisition, neither Parent nor any Borrower shall, nor shall they permit their respective Subsidiaries to, issue or sell or enter into any agreement or arrangement for the issuance or sale of any of its Equity Interests.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	6.13
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Inventory with Bailees
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Neither Parent nor any Borrower shall, nor shall they permit their respective Subsidiaries to, other than as set forth on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule&#160;4.24
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, other than as permitted under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section&#160;5.14
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;and other than consigned Inventory, store Inventory at any time with a bailee, warehouseman, or similar party, or Transfer any Collateral to any such location without Agent&#8217;s prior written consent.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	6.14
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Parent as Holding Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Parent shall not incur any liabilities (other than liabilities arising under the Loan Documents), own or acquire any assets (other than the Equity Interests of Borrowers and its other Subsidiaries) or engage itself in any operations or business, except in connection with its ownership of Borrowers and Parent&#8217;s other Subsidiaries and Parent&#8217;s rights and obligations under the Loan Documents.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:312PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	59
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:7PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:7PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>

<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage156"></A>
<A NAME="SPNE-20151231EX102CREDITAG_HTM_SF98EB4593DE14080BB8766791467BC66">
</A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	6.15
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Modifications to Material Contracts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Neither Parent nor any Borrower shall, nor shall they permit their respective Subsidiaries to, amend, modify or waive any provision of (a)&#160;any Material Contract, unless the net effect of such amendment, modification or waiver is not adverse to any Loan Party, Agent or Lenders, or (b)&#160;any document relating to any Subordinated Indebtedness.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	6.16
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Antilayering
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Borrowers shall not incur or suffer to exist Indebtedness that is senior in right of payment to the Loans or any of the other Obligations under the Loan Documents, as the case may be, and expressly subordinate in right of payment to any other Indebtedness of such Person.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	FINANCIAL COVENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Each of Parent and each Borrower covenants and agrees that, until termination of all of the Commitments and payment in full of the Obligations (other than contingent Obligations as to which any claim has been asserted), during any Covenant Testing Period, Borrowers will maintain a Fixed Charge Coverage Ratio of at least 1.10 to 1.00 measured as of the last day of the prior fiscal month for the applicable Measurement Period. At all times when no Covenant Testing Period exists, Parent and Borrowers shall have no obligations under this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section&#160;7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;PADDING-TOP:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	8.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	EVENTS OF DEFAULT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Any one or more of the following events shall constitute an event of default (each, an &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Event of Default
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;) under this Agreement:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	8.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Payments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. If any Loan Party fail to pay when due and payable, or when declared due and payable, (a)&#160;all or any portion of the Obligations consisting of interest, fees, or charges due the Lender Group, reimbursement of Lender Group Expenses, or other amounts (other than any portion thereof constituting principal) constituting Obligations (including any portion thereof that accrues after the commencement of an Insolvency Proceeding, regardless of whether allowed or allowable in whole or in part as a claim in any such Insolvency Proceeding), and such failure continues for a period of 5 Business Days, (b)&#160;all or any portion of the principal of the Loans, or (c)&#160;any amount payable to Issuing Bank in reimbursement of any drawing under a Letter of Credit;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	8.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Covenants
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. If any Loan Party or any of its Subsidiaries:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	fails to perform or observe any covenant or other agreement contained in any of (i)&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sections&#160;3.6, 5.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;(solely if any Borrower is not in good standing in its jurisdiction of organization),
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;(solely if any Borrower refuses to allow Agent or its representatives or agents to visit any Borrower&#8217;s properties, inspect its assets or books or records, examine and make copies of its books and records, or discuss Borrowers&#8217; affairs, finances, and accounts with officers and employees of any Borrower),
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5.10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5.11
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5.13
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5.14
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5.15
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5.16
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5.17
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;of this Agreement,
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:312PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(ii)&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section&#160;6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;of this Agreement, (iii)&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section&#160;7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;of this Agreement, or (iv)&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section&#160;7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;of the Guaranty and Security Agreement;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	fails to perform or observe any covenant or other agreement contained in any of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sections&#160;5.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;(other than if any Borrower is not in good standing in its jurisdiction of organization),
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5.12
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;of this Agreement and such failure continues for a period of 10 days after the earlier of (i)&#160;the date on which such failure shall first become known to any officer of any Borrower or (ii)&#160;the date on which written notice thereof is given to Borrowers by Agent; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(f)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	fails to perform or observe any covenant or other agreement contained in this Agreement, or in any of the other Loan Documents, in each case, other than any such covenant or agreement that is the subject of another provision of this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section&#160;8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;(in which event such other provision of this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section&#160;8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;shall govern), and such failure continues for a period of 30 days after the earlier of (i)&#160;the date on which such failure shall first become known to any officer of any Borrower or (ii)&#160;the date on which written notice thereof is given to Borrowers by Agent;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	8.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Judgments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. If one or more judgments, orders, or awards for the payment of cash involving an aggregate amount of $250,000, or more (except to the extent fully covered (other than to the extent of customary deductibles) by insurance pursuant to which the insurer has not denied coverage) is entered or filed against a Loan Party or any of its Subsidiaries, or with respect to any of their respective assets, and either (a)&#160;there is a period of 45 consecutive days at any time after the entry of any such judgment, order, or award during which (1)&#160;the same is not discharged, satisfied, vacated, or bonded pending appeal, or (2)&#160;a stay of enforcement thereof is not in effect, or (b)&#160;enforcement proceedings are commenced upon such judgment, order, or award;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	8.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Voluntary Bankruptcy, etc
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. If an Insolvency Proceeding is commenced by a Loan Party or any of its Subsidiaries;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	8.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Involuntary Bankruptcy, etc
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. If an Insolvency Proceeding is commenced against a Loan Party or any of its Subsidiaries and any of the following events occur: (a)&#160;such Loan Party or such Subsidiary consents to the institution of such Insolvency Proceeding against it, (b)&#160;the petition commencing the Insolvency Proceeding is not timely controverted, (c)&#160;the petition commencing the Insolvency Proceeding is not dismissed within 60 calendar days of the date of the filing thereof, (d)&#160;an interim trustee is appointed to take possession of all or any substantial portion of the properties or assets of, or to operate all or any substantial portion of the business of, such Loan Party or its Subsidiary, or (e)&#160;an order for relief shall have been issued or entered therein;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	8.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Default Under Other Agreements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. If there is (a)&#160;a default in one or more agreements to which a Loan Party or any of its Subsidiaries is a party with one or more third Persons relative to a Loan Party&#8217;s or any of its Subsidiaries&#8217; Indebtedness involving an aggregate amount of $250,000 or more, and such default (i)&#160;occurs at the final maturity of the obligations thereunder,
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:312PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	61
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:7PT;">

<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	or (ii)&#160;results in a right by such third Person, irrespective of whether exercised, to accelerate the maturity of such Loan Party&#8217;s or its Subsidiary&#8217;s obligations thereunder, or (b)&#160;a default in or an involuntary early termination of one or more Hedge Agreements to which a Loan Party or any of its Subsidiaries is a party with a value in excess of $250,000, or (c)&#160;the occurrence of any event that terminates, or permits any counterparty to terminate, any Patent License or any consent to a sublicense of such Patent License to Agent, in each case applicable to any Eligible Inventory with a value in excess of $100,000;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	8.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Representations, etc
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. If any warranty, representation, certificate, statement, or Record made herein or in any other Loan Document or delivered in writing to Agent or any Lender in connection with this Agreement or any other Loan Document proves to be untrue in any material respect (except that such materiality qualifier shall not be applicable to any representations and warranties that already are qualified or modified by materiality in the text thereof) as of the date of issuance or making or deemed making thereof;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	8.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Guaranty
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. If the obligation of any Guarantor under the guaranty contained in the Guaranty and Security Agreement is limited or terminated by operation of law or by such Guarantor (other than in accordance with the terms of this Agreement);
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	8.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Security Documents
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. If the Guaranty and Security Agreement, any Intellectual Property Security Agreement or any other Loan Document that purports to create a Lien, shall, for any reason, fail or cease to create a valid and perfected and, except to the extent of Permitted Liens which are non-consensual Permitted Liens, permitted purchase money Liens or the interests of lessors under Capital Leases, first priority Lien on the Collateral covered thereby, except (a)&#160;as a result of a disposition of the applicable Collateral in a transaction permitted under this Agreement, or (b)&#160;as the result of an action or failure to act on the part of Agent;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	8.10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Loan Documents
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. The validity or enforceability of any Loan Document shall at any time for any reason (other than solely as the result of an action or failure to act on the part of Agent) be declared to be null and void, or a proceeding shall be commenced by a Loan Party or its Subsidiaries, or by any Governmental Authority having jurisdiction over a Loan Party or its Subsidiaries, seeking to establish the invalidity or unenforceability thereof, or a Loan Party or its Subsidiaries shall deny that such Loan Party or its Subsidiaries has any liability or obligation purported to be created under any Loan Document;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	8.11
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Change of Control
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. A Change of Control shall occur, whether directly or indirectly.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	8.12
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Lockbox Instructions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. If (a)&#160;any instruction or agreement regarding any Non-Government Receivables Lockbox Account is amended or terminated without the written consent of Agent, (b)&#160;any Borrower fails to forward any Collections on Accounts to the applicable Non-Government Receivables Lockbox Account as required pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section&#160;7(k)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;of the Guaranty
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:312PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	62
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:138%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:7PT;">
